summary: A set of two rings that increase Alchemy, Barter, Enchanting and Smithing by 50/100% respectively.
descriptionHtml:
I made these rings for people who are tired of needing several sets of armor for these special effects. So I combined them all into two convenient rings with the option of a lesser ring for those who want a more balanced experience. I hope you enjoy.
-------------- 
 Installation
--------------
Just extract the .esp file into your Skyrim Data folder. 

The rings can be found under the jewelry menu at a blacksmith\'s forge.

To acquire in game:
For the 50% version have:
1 ruby
1 silver ingot
1 filled grand soul gem

For the 100% version have:
Arcane Blacksmith Perk
1 flawless ruby
1 silver ingot
1 filled black soul gem


----------------
 Uninstallation
----------------
Unequip the rings in game and then remove the .esp file from your Skyrim Data folder. 
If the file is removed without unequipping the rings, the character will permanently have 50/100% reduction in fortify costs respectively.
author: Bhurler1
